sentence.idiomatic: Global warming will perhaps cause glaciers to melt, and sea levels to rise.
Many scientists believe human destruction is the main cause of global warming.

word.literal: to have something to do with

sentence.idiomatic: These past few years there have been more and more natural disasters. Does this have anything to do with global warming?
I've heard that the greenhouse effect will reduce crop output.
In order to prevent the greenhouse effect on earth, we should protect the environment.
Many countries have indicated that they are going to reduce greenhouse effect-inducing carbon dioxide emissions.
According to meteorological predictions, the force of this hurricane will probably bring huge devastation to this area.
When disaster suddenly struck him, his first thought was that he must be strong and survive.
Terrorists are unceasingly engineering calamities, causing the world to become less and less peaceful.
How come you're acting like my mother? Every time you see me you start preaching to me.
This kind of preachy article just reflects one kind of reasoning. It's both long and long-winded.
I'm already fed up with his preachy sermons. Does he really not know that actions surpass any kind of lecture?
Although the government prohibits minors to use internet bars, a lot of students are still going to internet bars the same as always.
Without your help, he finished the work easily, as always.

word.literal: to be hard to come by

sentence.idiomatic: Even after he became the president, he still ate in the employee lunch room, the same as before. That's really rare.
In the last while, the most closely followed matter of interest has been the presidential election.
Once life becomes affluent, a lot of people start to pay attention to the matter of having healthy diet.
Parents shouldn't only pay attention to a child's grades. They should pay more attention to a child's development.
Don't cry. What is the worst thing that could happen because of not passing one exam? As long as you make a greater effort from now on, it will be OK.
He isn't today's lead role. Whether he comes or not is not that big of a deal.
A couple having an argument isn't such a big deal. You'd best just get over it.
He loves to gossip. Absolutely do not take what he says seriously.
The main job of students is to study--don't not take studying seriously.
He only is aware of his work, he's never taken his family seriously.
University students are faced with the twofold pressures of family and society. Their living conditions have piqued all of society's interest.
After the state abolished the agricultural tax, the difficult subsistence of the peasants took on a quite new appearance.
From this investigation we could see that living conditions are very wretched for wildlife in forests that have been destroyed.
Due to poor weather conditions, all of the flights from this airport have been canceled.
I didn't know his character was so poor. He even cheated his favorite brother.
Using insulting speech to humiliate opponents on the field--this kind of behavior is very vile.
He is the elected representative of the people. His thinking is definitely more enlightened than ours.
In creating a civilized city, it is not enough to only rely upon the citizens' consciousness; taking practical steps is the only way.
Feminists believe that women should raise their consciousness. They cannot comply with others' designs.
The weather now is totally abnormal. It's so hot!
Don't you know this is the global warming phenomenon? It's going to get hotter and hotter.

Ugh! As soon as I hear those technical weather terms, I just get annoyed. Can you not talk about it? First it's the greenhouse effect, then it's global warming. How come they're such a mouthful to say?

How can you only pay attention to that? The consequences of the greenhouse effect are very grave. Have you seen Al Gore's documentary? For every 0.1 degree the earth's temperature rises, it's a calamity for the human race.
I think this kind of preaching is of absolutely no use. Since I saw it, everything has been the same as always.

However, now a lot of people have started to pay more attention to the climate issue. Especially in Europe and America--a lot of people are trying to transform the environment through their day-to-day behavior.
To tell the truth, I think that the calamities brought on by climate change seem very distant from my life. So the earth is a little warmer--what's the worst that can happen?
Don't take it lightly. Although no one can be certain of the particular disastrous results, there is one thing for certain: living conditions for humans will become very poor.
After going on for half the day, you are basically saying the same thing I am.
What? I am a lot more aware than you. I've already started driving my car less, and using less electricity.
Hmph. Like that will really lower the temperature of the earth. You're really putting yourself out.

word.literal: in the same old way; as before
to drop in temperature; to cool down
